# Causal interactions

Make the loading spinner UI part of the interaction UI so that the triggered loading behavior is directly and explicitly tied to the user interaction that caused the behavior https://codepen.io/heliocrat/pen/vWawYM

https://codepen.io/heliocrat/pen/GRKxggm
